subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Petty Enterprises has moved from Level Cross, N.C., to just north of Charlotte in Mooresville, a town that bills itself as Race City USA and is a hub for the Nascar racing community.
snippet: Petty Enterprises has moved from Level Cross, N.C., to just north of Charlotte in Mooresville, a town that bills itself as Race City USA and is a hub for the Nascar racing community.
